General.Name: TinOne Resources Inc.
General.Description: TinOne Resources Inc. operates as a mining exploration company in Australia and New Zealand. The company explores for gold and tin deposits. It holds interest in the Glen Innes, Tingha, Emmaville, Aberfoyle, Great Pyramid, Panama, and Tin Hill projects located in Australia; and the Nevis Valley and Teviot East projects located in New Zealand. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1090 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 3V7

6.Name: Mr. Russell  Fulton B.Sc.(Geol), M Econ. Geol, MAusIMM
